comments.body: These tests aren't checking the full list, so we added a way to test for the start of of a message instead of the full message

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +315,319 @@                        category: Diagnostics.Argument_for_0_option_must_be_Colon_1.category,
                        code: Diagnostics.Argument_for_0_option_must_be_Colon_1.code,
                        file: undefined,
                        start: undefined,
                        length: undefined,
